The user slams their hand on the ground, creating a network of grids which inflict pain on the victim.

== Trivia ==
* [[Hizashi Hyūga]], in [[Jiraiya]]'s novel within [[Tsunade]]'s [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]] dream, was able to use this technique.
* It was suspected that the presence of [[Shinobi Ageha]] were a part of the technique's execution.
